pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculation and Plot of Gene Correlationship in TCGA/GTEx/CCLE // The data of TCGA (The Cancer Genome Atlas), GTEx (Genotype- Tissue Expression), and CCLE (Broad Institute Cancer Cell Line Encyclopedia) are downloaded and preprocessed. With the help of 'pancor', one can easily calculate the correlation of two gene in any cancer type. Reference: Huang, H. (2019) doi:10.1038/s41586-019-1016-7.
